personas.title: Personas
personas.description: What kind of people use this?
personas.content: {$page.description} Introduction The primary users that interact with Testray typically fall into the Testray User, Testray Analyst, Testray Lead, Testray Administrator roles. These roles increase in privileges from User which has view only permissions to Administrator which has full range of permissions. Index of Roles Testray Administrator Testray Lead Testray Analyst Testray User Project Permissions ---- | Action | User | Analyst | Lead | Administrator | | ------------- | :-----: | :-----: | :-----: | :-----------: | | Create | | | | O | | Edit | | | | O | | Delete | | | | O | | View | O | O | O | O | Case Type Permissions ---- | Action | User | Analyst | Lead | Administrator | | ------------- | :-----: | :-----: | :-----: | :-----------: | | Create | | | | O | | Edit | | | | O | | Delete | | | | O | | View | O | O | O | O | Factor Category Permissions ---- | Action | User | Analyst | Lead | Administrator | | ------------- | :-----: | :-----: | :-----: | :-----------: | | Create | | | | O | | Edit | | | | O | | Delete | | | | O | | View | O | O | O | O | Factor Option Permissions ---- | :-----------: | | Create | | | O | O | | Edit | | | O | O | | Delete | | | O | O | | View | O | O | O | O | Case Permissions ---- | Action | User | Analyst | Lead | Administrator | | ------------- | :-----: | :-----: | :-----: | :-----------: | | Create | | O | O | O | | Edit | | O | O | O | | Delete | | O | O | O | | View | O | O | O | O | Suite Permissions ---- | Action | User | Analyst | Lead | Administrator | | ------------- | :-----: | :-----: | :-----: | :-----------: | | Create | | | O | O | | Edit | | | O | O | | Delete | | | O | O | | View | O | O | O | O | Routine Permissions ---- | Action | User | Analyst | Lead | Administrator | | ------------- | :-----: | :-----: | :-----: | :-----------: | | Create | | | O | O | | Edit | | | O | O | | Delete | | | O | O | | View | O | O | O | testray-administrator.title: Testray Administrator
testray-administrator.content: Description A Testray Administrators has access to all of Testray. These users are normally elevated to be able to administer other users or system configurations. The Testray Administrator will perform all of the initial configurations, such as configuring and populating a Project and populating options for factors. In many cases, the administrator wont engage in any of the analysis tasks. This would be left to the Testray Analyst, and Testray Lead. Example Users Below are Users that we expect to be Testray Administrators Kristoffer Onias - Primary administrator for the Global QA team and Product Manager Ethan Bustad - Lead developer on the IS Team for Testray Role Permissions | Resource | Create | Edit | Delete | View | | ---------------- | :-----: | :-----: | :-----: | :-----: | | Projects | O | O | O | O | | Case Types | O | O | O | O | | Categories | O | O | O | O | | Options | O | O | O | O | | Product Versions | O | O | O | O | | Teams | O | O | O | O | | Components | O | O | O | O | | Cases | O | O | O | O | | Suites | O | O | O | O | | Routines | O | O | O | O | | Builds | O | O | O | O | | Results | O | O | O | O | | Tasks | O | O | O | O | | Subtasks | O | O | O | O | | Autofill | O | O | O | O | | Compare | O | O | O | O |

testray-analyst.title: Testray Analyst
testray-analyst.content: Description A Testray Analyst will have access to all analysis tools and will be primarily responsible for analyzing results or completing tasks. A Testray Analyst may use compare to give their sign offs on a build for a release.

testray-lead.title: Testray Lead
testray-lead.content: Description A Testray Lead is a user who typically leads a group of testers. They should have permissions to create user groups, create and assign tasks and create other Testray content (Builds, Runs, Results).

testray-user.title: Testray User
testray-user.content: Description A Testray User is the lowest level access user that has view only permissions. Their primary function is to be able to go through results for root cause analysis. They do not have permissions to initiate any workflows on results, create tasks, or use any of the tools. Technical Support Engineers, Customer Support, and Training are example departments that would categorize as a review only group. They'll normally want to go in to look at upstream master or ee-7.0.x to look at the latest results or to review a pull request.

1_0.title: Testray 1.0
1_0.content: {$page.description} Overview A Testray User is the lowest level access user that has view only permissions. Their primary function is to be able to go through results for root cause analysis. They do not have permissions to initiate any workflows on results, create tasks, or use any of the tools. Technical Support Engineers, Customer Support, and Training are example departments that would categorize as a review only group. They'll normally want to go in to look at upstream master or ee-7.0.x to look at the latest results or to review a pull request.
